name: Dear - A letter writing simulator
description:
Thank you for showing interest in our little project !

Dear was developed in 4 months by a team of first 5 then 7 students. The point of the project was to work without real game artists and focus on an original gameplay loop. 

Dear is a systemic narrative game where you gather fields of words based on a letter that you receive. You click on phrases that seem the most relevant to your client's problems in hope of gathering interesting words to then craft an answer. 

Designers : Lila Grimaldi, Jul Ismaël Tien, Loïc Voisin, Virgile Pauli

Devs : Nils Vandamme, Julien Crépin, David Durand
